about_the_game:
This game is an ideal example of a challenging physics puzzle game. The game will reward you with:
  • 70 levels
  • 3 types of platforms: regular, sticky and bouncy
  • High variability
  • Cute love story
  • Minimalistic design



The goal of the game is simple — to collect all the asterisks by falling words. To do this you need to be a typing master: type letters in the right places and drop them by pressing enter!

Letters have different shapes and physics and based on that there are various mechanics in the game: bridge, domino, hanging, rolling and more!



You can come up with your solution, so be creative and don't be afraid to think outside the box! Unlike other brain teaser games with repetitive levels, Fall Words has each puzzle to be unique and challenging.



This is also a romantic puzzle game with a love story behind it! A male alien met a female alien and exchanged contact with her and they proceeded conversation in a Messenger. To answer correctly a player must type the right letters and after sending the message the letters will fall like physical objects. There are asterisks in the game levels that a player must collect by the falling letters. If all the asterisks are collected, the message is positive and the level is completed.

This game is an ideal example of a challenging physics puzzle game. The game will reward you with:
  • 70 levels
  • 3 types of platforms: regular, sticky and bouncy
  • High variability

The goal of the game is simple — to collect all the asterisks by falling words. To do this you need to be a typing master: type letters in the right places and drop them by pressing enter!

Letters have different shapes and physics and based on that there are various mechanics in the game: bridge, domino, hanging, rolling and more!



You can come up with your solution, so be creative and don't be afraid to think outside the box! Unlike other brain teaser games with repetitive levels, Fall Words has each puzzle to be unique and challenging.



This is also a romantic puzzle game with a love story behind it! A male alien met a female alien and exchanged contact with her and they proceeded conversation in a Messenger. To answer correctly a player must type the right letters and after sending the message the letters will fall like physical objects. There are asterisks in the game levels that a player must collect by the falling letters. If all the asterisks are collected, the message is positive and the level is completed.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 & Steam OS
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard is required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.x (Show Leopard)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard is required

name: Fall Words

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard (English) is required

short_description: Fall Words is a HARD physics-based puzzle game where you type letters to drop them and collect all the asterisks.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support
